text: The elder [strongs id="g4245" /] unto the elect [strongs id="g1588" /] lady [strongs id="g2959" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] her [strongs id="g846" /] children [strongs id="g5043" /], whom [strongs id="g3739" /] I [strongs id="g1473" /] love [strongs id="g25" tvm="PresActInd" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] the truth [strongs id="g225" /]; and [strongs id="g2532" /] not [strongs id="g3756" /] I [strongs id="g1473" /] only [strongs id="g3441" /], but [strongs id="g235" /] also [strongs id="g2532" /] all [strongs id="g3956" /] they that have known [strongs id="g1097" tvm="PerfActPtc" /] the truth [strongs id="g225" /];

I rejoiced [strongs id="g5463" tvm="Aor2PasDepInd" /] greatly [strongs id="g3029" /] that [strongs id="g3754" /] I found [strongs id="g2147" tvm="PerfActInd" /] of [strongs id="g1537" /] thy [strongs id="g4675" /] children [strongs id="g5043" /] walking [strongs id="g4043" tvm="PresActPtc" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] truth [strongs id="g225" /], as [strongs id="g2531" /] we have received [strongs id="g2983" tvm="Aor2ActInd" /] a commandment [strongs id="g1785" /] from [strongs id="g3844" /] the Father [strongs id="g3962" /].

This [strongs id="g3778" /] is [strongs id="g2076" tvm="PresInd" /] a deceiver [strongs id="g4108" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] an antichrist [strongs id="g500" /].

Look [strongs id="g991" tvm="PresActImpr" /] to yourselves [strongs id="g1438" /], that we lose [strongs id="g622" tvm="AorActSubj" /] not [strongs id="g3363" /] those things which [strongs id="g3739" /] we have wrought [strongs id="g2038" tvm="AorMidDepInd" /], but [strongs id="g235" /] that we receive [strongs id="g618" tvm="Aor2ActSubj" /] a full [strongs id="g4134" /] reward [strongs id="g3408" /].
